downloadDescription: A practical guide to the key benefits of FIDO2/Webauthn authentication

downloadFile.name: An overview of password-less authentication - v2.0.docx

detailsSection:
Microsoft is committed to providing a future without passwords. This document is an overview of the key benefits of password-less authentication using Windows Hello for Business, FIDO2 Security Keys and the Microsoft Authenticator App.
This document is intended for IT professionals, security professionals CISOs who are interested in understanding how Microsoft can help develop a robust approach to go beyond passwords and deploy next generation authentication credentials.
detailsSection_file_name: An overview of password-less authentication - v2.0.docx
systemRequirementsSection: The whitepaper is a Microsoft Word document.
installInstructionSection: Users who do not have Microsoft Word can download the Word mobile app from the Microsoft Store.
